pages.text: Several new machines aid in tedious, time consuming, and resource intensive processes.
The $(thing)Magnetizer$() is a machine used to magnetize raw magnets into permanent magnets.
The $(thing)Auto-Quern$() is a machine used to automatically grind items into powders and dyes.
The $(thing)Steel Grindstone$() is the tool used within the $(thing)Auto-Quern$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Extruding Machine$() is a machine used to automatically form metal rods and wires. Requires metal that is hot enough to work.
The $(thing)Steel Machine Die$() is the tool used within the $(thing)Extruding Machine$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Rolling Machine$() is a machine used to automatically form metal sheets. Requires metal that is hot enough to work.
The $(thing)Steel Rollers$() are tools used within the $(thing)Rolling Machine$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Electric Loom$() is a machine used to automatically weave different kinds of string into cloth. Also used in making paper.
The $(thing)Steel Loom Parts$() are components used within the $(thing)Electric Loom$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Scraping Machine$() is a machine used to automatically scrape items such as leather and paper.
